expired.description: The payment session has expired. Please create a new payment.
expired.title: Payment Expired

failed.description: Your payment could not be completed. Please try again.
failed.title: Payment Failed

notFound.description: We couldn't find this payment record.
notFound.title: Payment Not Found

pending.description: Your payment is being processed on the blockchain.
pending.note: Cryptocurrency payments may take a few minutes to be confirmed. This page will automatically update when your payment is confirmed.
pending.title: Payment Processing
